document.text:
From: ' 
To:'
Subject: couple JE things 
Date: Sat, 29 Jun 2019 20:20:14 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: 2019-06-29, JE,_govemment_unsealing_request_and_order.docx; 2019-06-
29, JE,_victim_notification,arrest,_draft.docx 
In an effort to reduce the number of things we'll have to scramble to do whenever the arrest occurs, there are a couple 
new saved does in the share for whichever one of us ends up handling particular random things — in the Grand Jury/ 
Indictment materials folder is an unsealing request and proposed order, since we'll want to do that immediately upon 
arrest. 
Also, I created a new "Victim notification" folder and added a draft of what I think we should put up on a victim 
notification page on our website (like 
), 
which we can add updates to as the case goes along. can put that up 
when it's time. 
Neither is any rush at the moment, obviously, but they're attached in case anybody wants to take a look and have any 
comments / corrections / edits so they're ready to go when necessary. And if either of you can think of anything else we 
should be doing now to save ourselves a few minutes down the road, say the word I  Thx. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00014435
